about

Hi, I am Sidhant Nagpal. Welcome to my blog.
I am a Computer Science Undergraduate pursuing B.E. (Bachelor of Engineering) at NSIT (Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology) Delhi, India. You can look at my resume here.
I enjoy doing Competitive Programming, and contributing to Open Source. I have deep interests in Computational Mathematics, Algorithm Design and Theoretical Computer Science. Details of my contributions and projects can be found here.
